promptOptions.prompt: A woman discovers her knight in shining armor is a douchebag.
A person wearing a ski mask ventures into the digital realm.
A florist sprays her bouquets with her enemy's favorite perfume.
A pianist plagarizes a symphony by her teacher's mom.
A clown and a rower enter a screaming match at the morgue.
A person dressed as a bee cries in the middle of the parking lot.
A pageant queen constructs her 100th bookcase.
A ghost adopts a cat and they chill together by the river.
A dude quits the mafia business and opens up an actual pizza shop.
